events.name: Importance of battery raw materials for a low-carbon society
events.wd_label: Importance of battery raw materials for a low-carbon society
events.wd_description: Battery raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel are essential for a technologically advanced low-carbon society. These commodities are primarily produced in a few countries, leading to supply risk, environmental, and ethical issues.
events.description: Battery raw materials such as cobalt, lithium, graphite, and nickel are essential for a technologically advanced low-carbon society. These commodities are primarily produced in a few countries, leading to supply risk, environmental, and ethical issues.

events.name: Cobalt
events.wd_description: Cobalt is one of the essential battery raw materials for a low-carbon society.
events.description: Cobalt is one of the essential battery raw materials for a low-carbon society.

events.name: Lithium
events.wd_description: Lithium is another essential battery raw material for a low-carbon society.
events.description: Lithium is another essential battery raw material for a low-carbon society.

events.name: Graphite
events.wd_description: Graphite is an essential battery raw material for a low-carbon society.
events.description: Graphite is an essential battery raw material for a low-carbon society.

events.name: Nickel
events.wd_description: Nickel is one of the essential battery raw materials for a low-carbon society.
events.description: Nickel is one of the essential battery raw materials for a low-carbon society.

events.name: Supply risk
events.wd_description: The concentration of production in a few countries leads to supply risk for battery raw materials.
events.description: The concentration of production in a few countries leads to supply risk for battery raw materials.

events.name: Environmental issues
events.wd_description: The production of battery raw materials is associated with various environmental issues.
events.description: The production of battery raw materials is associated with various environmental issues.

events.name: Ethical issues
events.wd_description: The production of battery raw materials also raises ethical issues.
events.description: The production of battery raw materials also raises ethical issues.

events.name: Finland's ecosystem for improving battery raw materials supply chain
events.wd_label: Finland's ecosystem for improving battery raw materials supply chain
events.wd_description: Finland, with its available mineral resources, industry, and technical expertise, has an ideal ecosystem to tackle the challenge of improving the rechargeable battery raw materials supply chain and securing sustainable sources for Europe.
events.description: Finland, with its available mineral resources, industry, and technical expertise, has an ideal ecosystem to tackle the challenge of improving the rechargeable battery raw materials supply chain and securing sustainable sources for Europe.

events.name: Mineral resources
events.wd_description: Finland has available mineral resources, including battery mineral deposits and operating mines.
events.description: Finland has available mineral resources, including battery mineral deposits and operating mines.

events.name: Industry
events.wd_description: Finland has a strong metallurgical industry, including processing plants, smelters, and refineries.
events.description: Finland has a strong metallurgical industry, including processing plants, smelters, and refineries.

events.name: Technical expertise
events.wd_description: Finland has technical expertise in areas such as know-how, automation, and low-price clean energy.
events.description: Finland has technical expertise in areas such as know-how, automation, and low-price clean energy.

events.name: Role of geometallurgy in sustainable battery raw materials production
events.wd_label: Role of geometallurgy in sustainable battery raw materials production
events.wd_description: Geometallurgy combines geological and metallurgical information to improve resource management, optimize extraction, and reduce technical risks. It is a key multidisciplinary approach to tackling the challenge of sustainable and responsible EU domestic production of battery raw materials.
events.description: Geometallurgy combines geological and metallurgical information to improve resource management, optimize extraction, and reduce technical risks. It is a key multidisciplinary approach to tackling the challenge of sustainable and responsible EU domestic production of battery raw materials.

events.name: Geological information
events.wd_description: Geological information is combined with metallurgical information in geometallurgy.
events.description: Geological information is combined with metallurgical information in geometallurgy.

events.name: Metallurgical information
events.wd_description: Metallurgical information is combined with geological information in geometallurgy.
events.description: Metallurgical information is combined with geological information in geometallurgy.

events.name: Resource management
events.wd_description: Geometallurgy aims to improve resource management for sustainable battery raw materials production.
events.description: Geometallurgy aims to improve resource management for sustainable battery raw materials production.

events.name: Extraction optimization
events.wd_description: Geometallurgy aims to optimize extraction processes for battery raw materials.
events.description: Geometallurgy aims to optimize extraction processes for battery raw materials.

events.name: Technical risk reduction
events.wd_description: Geometallurgy aims to reduce technical risks associated with battery raw materials production.
events.description: Geometallurgy aims to reduce technical risks associated with battery raw materials production.

events.name: Finland's ideal ecosystem for battery raw materials supply chain
events.wd_label: Finland's ideal ecosystem for battery raw materials supply chain
events.wd_description: Finland's available mineral resources, metallurgical industry, and technical expertise create an ideal ecosystem to improve the battery raw materials supply chain and secure a sustainable, conflict-free source for Europe.
events.description: Finland's available mineral resources, metallurgical industry, and technical expertise create an ideal ecosystem to improve the battery raw materials supply chain and secure a sustainable, conflict-free source for Europe.

events.name: Mineral resources
events.wd_description: Finland has available mineral resources, including battery mineral deposits and operating mines.
events.description: Finland has available mineral resources, including battery mineral deposits and operating mines.

events.name: Metallurgical industry
events.wd_description: Finland has a strong metallurgical industry, including processing plants, smelters, and refineries.
events.description: Finland has a strong metallurgical industry, including processing plants, smelters, and refineries.

events.name: Technical expertise
events.wd_description: Finland has technical expertise in areas such as know-how, automation, and low-price clean energy.
events.description: Finland has technical expertise in areas such as know-how, automation, and low-price clean energy.

events.name: Production concentration in few countries
events.description: Most battery raw materials are produced in just a few countries, leading to supply risks and environmental and ethical issues.

events.name: Metallurgy and refining
events.description: Finland's industry includes metallurgy and refining, essential components of the battery raw materials supply chain

events.name: Automation and technical expertise
events.description: Finland's technical expertise, including automation and know-how, supports its role in improving the battery raw materials supply chain.

events.name: Linking deposit geology and ore mineralogy
events.description: Geometallurgy combines geological and metallurgical information to improve resource management, optimize extraction, and reduce technical risks.

events.name: Key multidisciplinary approach
events.description: Geometallurgy is a key multidisciplinary approach to achieving sustainable and responsible EU domestic production of battery raw materials.

events.name: Low price clean energy
events.description: Finland's access to low-price clean energy supports its ideal ecosystem for the battery raw materials supply chain
